2093860.name: Get the Ball Rolling
2093860.description:
6/28/2023: Update 6 - The Demo Update is out now!

Get the Ball Rolling is a single player adventure puzzle platformer with physics, portals, powerups and exploration. As a ball with little to no recollection of your past, it's up to you to discover why you were put on a strange island filled with gateways. While still early in development, Get the Ball Rolling is a fully playable game from start to finish, including a mainland island connected to 13 puzzles through portals, a finale puzzle, 6 collectable permanent powerups (Jump, Double Jump, Climb and more), 3 temporary powerups (Big Ball, Fast Ball, Multi Ball), a 3 profile save/load and hot reload system, and more!

Cost: $9.99. This price will not change upon leaving Early Access.
Current estimated time to completion: 3+ hours.
Keyboard + Mouse and Controllers supported!

New Demo out now!
-Play Puzzles 1 through 5 (Out of 14)!
-Explore the entire Mainland!
-Acquire all 6 of the game's powers!

Full Disclosure: The Demo contains a large portion of the game. Not all of it, but the most polished parts. If you decide to purchase the game to see puzzles 6-14, I thank you deeply! But please be aware, while the latter half of the game is completely functional and contains many unique ideas and mechanics, it is unpolished. This will of course change over time into a fully polished game with regular updates and patches. GTBR is only 1 year old! Thanks for reading! <3

So what're you waitin' for? Get the Ball Rolling!
